page.title: 16Recreation and Leisure
page.content: There are lots of{Pubs}in Shiney Row and Penshaw and they both have a{Club and a community centre. The YMCA is in Herrington Burn which is quite popular with the young people. The pubs include The Shoulder of Mutton, The Odd Fellows Arms, The Grey Horse, The Prospect, The Travellers Rest, The Monument and The Lambton Arms.At The Prospect they have a Quiz Night which is very popular. The{YMCA}holds quite a number of events ranging from Karate, Judo, Junior Night and the YMCA Gala. This is held at the beginning of June.It is always opened by a famous person and this year and last it was Ken Dodd. In our survey we found that only a small number of people in Shiney Row went outside of the community for their leisure pursuits and these were for sporting hobbies eg. squash.
